item.description:
HEX hosts our first CGC Test Date, Sunday April 14th at 9:00a!

You need not be a HEX Client to take the test; this is open to all dogs, ages & breeds, whether or not you have trained with us before.

For information on the CGC steps, what you need to pass, equipment & more, visit our CGC page here: http://www.hexdogs.com/canine-good-citizen-training--testing.html.

Cost of the test is $15.

Please reference the site before emailing for more information, but that being said, if your question is not satisfied there, feel free to email me direct at justcassie101@gmail.com! (Thank you; it's to help keep the emails manageable!)

HEX offers CGC-Prep Drop-In Classes every Thursday at 7:00p & Sunday at 10:30a at MASH Vet (72 West Main Street, Hopkinton, MA 01748), should you want to brush up before the test!

If you'd like to take the test with us on this date, simply RSVP here and show up at HEXquarters (MASH Vet) around 9:00a on April 13th!

Cassie-Leigh Stock, ABCDT, CTDI (Evaluator Number 38262) will be evaluating.
item.name: HEX's First CGC Test Date! Sunday April 14th at 9:00a ;)
